attributes.action: I would like breast cancer screening to be offered from the age of 40.
attributes.background: Many diagnosis of cancer can not be picked up feeling a lump and are diagnosed through other tests for other conditions which can often be too late. Earlier screenings from 40 would prevent this from happening. Instead of the current 50 -71.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition:

Fund Breast Cancer Screening from Age 40 & Alternative Screening Options: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700062
